__TOC__

* Contact: [NicolasWanner]
* Make: ACER
* Brand: Aspire
* Model: 1690WLMi
* Website: http://www.acer.com/
* S/N: Only needed if you have a Canonical supplied laptop
=== Current Issues ===
* Have to add manualy irqpoll and pci=noacpi in grub to make the laptop work properly
* Have to install manualy FGLRX and modify the X11 configuration file to get 3D acceleration and TV output
